list.name: getUserBankIdsByUserId
list.sqlitem: select id from user_bank where user_id = ? order by first desc

map.name: getUserBankIdByUserIdAndFirst
map.sqlitem: select id from user_bank where user_id = ? and first = ?

list.name: getUserBankIdsAll
list.sqlitem: select id from user_bank where 1 = 1 order by create_at desc
